Episodes.Title: Coin Flip
Episodes.Writer: Bill Lawrence, Jason Segel, Brett Goldstein
Episodes.Actors: Jason Segel, Jessica Williams, Harrison Ford
Episodes.Plot: Jimmy, a therapist mourning his wife, takes a more proactive approach with his patients in the hopes that helping them will help himself.

Episodes.Title: Fortress of Solitude
Episodes.Writer: Bill Lawrence, Jason Segel, Brett Goldstein
Episodes.Actors: Jason Segel, Jessica Williams, Luke Tennie
Episodes.Plot: To get Sean out of legal trouble, Jimmy reconnects with his estranged best friend - while trying to hide it all from Paul.

Episodes.Title: Fifteen Minutes
Episodes.Writer: Bill Lawrence, Jason Segel, Brett Goldstein
Episodes.Actors: Jason Segel, Jessica Williams, Luke Tennie
Episodes.Plot: Jimmy witnesses Gaby in a compromising situation. Paul advises Alice on how to deal with her grief while facing a loss of his own.

Episodes.Title: Potatoes
Episodes.Writer: Bill Lawrence, Jason Segel, Brett Goldstein
Episodes.Actors: Jason Segel, Jessica Williams, Luke Tennie
Episodes.Plot: As things spiral at work, Jimmy confronts Liz for interfering in his life. Paul struggles with whether to tell his daughter his diagnosis.

Episodes.Title: Woof
Episodes.Writer: Bill Lawrence, Jason Segel, Brett Goldstein
Episodes.Actors: Jason Segel, Jessica Williams, Luke Tennie
Episodes.Plot: When Jimmy hits a roadblock with Sean, he doesn't have Paul to consult for advice. Brian makes an announcement about his relationship.

Episodes.Title: Imposter Syndrome
Episodes.Writer: Bill Lawrence, Jason Segel, Brett Goldstein
Episodes.Actors: Jason Segel, Jessica Williams, Luke Tennie
Episodes.Plot: At Alice's urging, Jimmy agrees to host a party. Gaby struggles with her post-divorce libido. Liz recommends medical marijuana to Paul.

Episodes.Title: Apology Tour
Episodes.Writer: Bill Lawrence, Jason Segel, Brett Goldstein
Episodes.Actors: Jason Segel, Jessica Williams, Luke Tennie
Episodes.Plot: Jimmy attempts damage control after his party. Paul's daughter pays another visit. Liz and Sean discover they have something in common.

Episodes.Title: Boop
Episodes.Writer: Bill Lawrence, Jason Segel, Brett Goldstein
Episodes.Actors: Jason Segel, Jessica Williams, Luke Tennie
Episodes.Plot: Paul and Brian come to Jimmy's aid when Alice starts acting out. Liz and Sean support Gaby by accompanying her to an event.

Episodes.Title: Moving Forward
Episodes.Writer: Bill Lawrence, Jason Segel, Brett Goldstein
Episodes.Actors: Jason Segel, Jessica Williams, Luke Tennie
Episodes.Plot: Jimmy encourages an ambivalent Paul to accept a career achievement award. Sean approaches Liz with a business proposal.

Episodes.Title: Closure
Episodes.Writer: Bill Lawrence, Jason Segel, Brett Goldstein
Episodes.Actors: Jason Segel, Jessica Williams, Luke Tennie
Episodes.Plot: Season finale. As Brian's wedding approaches, Alice takes issue with how Jimmy is living his life. Liz learns a secret.
